title: Prince Charming Is a Top - Novel Updates
tags: Charming Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Persistent Love Interests   Shy Characters   Sibling's Care
author: Qian Qianqian   千倩倩
description:
He realized that he was into men.

However, due to the varying societal attitudes toward homosexuality, only his childhood buddy knew about his sexual orientation. On one occasion, he bumped into the guy whom he had a crush on… He had planned to get close to him secretly, but he didn't expect that the Prince Charming in the eyes of everyone was actually…>
